column5: Someone may direct me----I was looking for what we used to call "My Controls" to change up the ole Avatar  I'm probably lookin right at it but cannot find---anyone?
Click on your own name, at the top of the page - a menu will drop down - click on settings  Don   ** sorry - then on the settings page - click on profile - then change avitar **
No prob - glad I could help - I see it worked for you!  Don
